Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~bmos299 we need an update on where this stands

Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: I will put together a post on this item and add weekly reports in rocket chat for the community to see our progress.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: We have added new jira tasks and stories in each functional area, to write and convert tests and tools, so this is effectively a duplicate of FAB-1017 and its pieces. Closing this one.
